Name: Bomb
Description: After scoringCOMMA destroy all played cards

Name: Rainbow Paint
Description: Before scoringCOMMA turn all played standard cards rainbowCOMMA permanently

Name: Blue Mushroom
Description: Before scoringCOMMA add [IncreaseValueSpecialCardImpact] to the value of all scored cardsCOMMA permanently

Name: Red Mushroom
Description: Before scoringCOMMA add [IncreaseMultSpecialCardImpact] to the multiplier of all scored cardsCOMMA permanently

Name: Pink Mushroom
Description: Before scoringCOMMA multiply the points and multiplier of all scored cards by [MultiplyPointsAndMultSpecialCardImpact]COMMA permanently

Name: Promotion
Description: Before scoringCOMMA increase the rank of all played cards by [PromotionImpact]. Aces become deuces

Name: Demotion
Description: Before scoringCOMMA decrease the rank of all played cards by [DemotionImpact]. Deuces become aces

Name: Magic Marker
Description: Before scoringCOMMA change all played cards to a singleCOMMA random rank

Name: Magic Mirror
Description: Before scoringCOMMA convert this card into the card directly to the left

Name: Spyglass
Description: Before scoringCOMMA gain a zodiac for your played hand

Name: Lucky 7
Description: Before scoringCOMMA spin a slot machine with a number of lines equal to the number of played standard 7's (1 minimum) once for each played Lucky 7. Earn lots of chips if you're lucky!

Name: Observatory
Description: Before scoringCOMMA gain a zodiac for each hand contained in your played hand
HowToUnlock: Play a hand that contains both a full house and a straight flush
